content.rendered:
Houseplansdirect  offers a wide range of house designs and self build services, to help you build the home of your dreams at a fraction of the normal cost.

Hiring an architect will take up 10-15% of your budget.

Simple changes to our designs to give them your own individual touch are easy and inexpensive, and our experienced designers will use their extensive knowledge of planning and building regulations to help turn your ideas into reality.

Our house designs are just a starting point.

What’s more, because our house designs are ready made, we know that they work for people like you and take into account the latest building regulations requirements. As a result they can be downloaded instantly, rather than waiting the weeks or months a custom design could take.

Designs amended to suit your needs.

We have hundreds of unique designs in our back catalogue which we are continually adding to our website. The illustrations shown are an example of how each of the house designs could look, as of course you can finish your home in whatever material you want – for example, stonework instead of brickwork, cladding or render, whatever your preference.

Save yourself a fortune!

We strive to offer outstanding and unique house designs, first class customer care, friendly and knowledgeable advice, and an overall service that makes the whole process simple and stress-free. From our humble beginnings in 2008, we have helped hundreds of customers like you achieve their goal of building their own home. Our range of knowledge and experience, coupled with the in-house services we offer, make the whole process as straightforward and hassle-free as possible.

All in all, it’s easy to see why buying from Houseplansdirect is the smart choice!

Have questions? Call us!

01432 806409

With over forty years’ experience in housebuilding, we are perfectly placed to offer self build advice, or guidance on planning applications and meeting building regulations.

Prefer to email? Contact Us to fill out our contact form.
